nodes.bodyText:
Please add the following to all the deprecated classes so devs know what to use instead and how to migrate to JUnit 5 This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters Suggested change * @since 1.11, 1.10, 1.9.9 * @since 1.11, 1.10, 1.9.9 * @deprecated as of 2.4 *

openmrs-core migrated its tests from JUnit 4 to JUnit 5. JUnit 4 helpers are still supported so module developers can gradually migrate tests from JUnit 4 to JUnit 5. To migrate your tests follow How to migrate to JUnit 5. The JUnit 5 version of the class is {@link org.openmrs.test.jupiter.BaseContextMockTest}.

Please make sure to adapt the link to the JUnit 5 version of the class for the other deprecated classes.
